extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: CHEM 313 or ENCH 346 or CHEM 346 and registered in BSCE

basic.description: Modern spectroscopic methods for the structural and electronic characterisation of molecules will be discussed, including: NMR, X-ray and synchrontron-based spectroscopies, laser spectroscopy, surface spectroscopic methods and scanning probe methods.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Adv. Meth. Physical Chem.
